@herbert_farrah my workout has included three shuffles to the coffee machine and 2 dilation. Knackered already. ðŸ˜‰
@TheBinaryGirl @Jennybabe41 Well the 1st couple of cups were ok after that...... You are right though we done good Christine :)
#VeronicasGRS I am exhausted. physically and emotionally. In a good place right now. Night all x
@TheBinaryGirl @Jennybabe41 The fed me next to nothing for 6 days. Consume & jelly made me retch after 1.5 days. Still blooming wonderful.
#VeronicasGRS elation, exhaustion and the sudden realisation that in 1 hour it's round 2 https://t.co/jGIO6JkHXB
I know there is some shitty stuff going on but I just want to say "oh my god, real good" https://t.co/yGy2fTvEPf
@TraceyJustRocks it's says I'm already there. Was looking for a beach but settled for the coffee machine x
@rvedotrc as you already knew it is/was amazing.

@Transsomething go if an hour either way was the reason for me I would of have spun cart wheels

Bless you and and thank you. You know it xxx https://t.co/IuHKid1Ssd

Blimey, my team are down "at the Lane". Great news for @wwfcofficial the beauty of the cup can never die. x

@claie_t that's weird I know everything about the gent. But it's gender? Not important ðŸ˜‰
@claie_t we are to marry next year ;)

@claie_t that was my logic.....
@claie_t I saw on the news - grim. Think its now time to switch to radio news....
@Veronica_Mead although picking crumbs of toast out from my bra? Well its an excuse I suppose to have a little feel around.
@hidingintrees yes, I did just see our unelected PM holding hands with that bafoon from the USA on the tv, so I now have doubts again.
#VeronicasGRS #DAY4 I will never tire of this pampering. https://t.co/LvpvPnmL3p

#VeronicasGRS Well Mr Thomas has been and gone. He took my autograph too.
#VeronicasGRS Just met the anestatist. Mr McDonald. Who seems lovely and Mr Yelland who drew over my tits and got me to sign stuff.
